tha-ap298:0.3_0: Declaring his foot, he was married with senior monks;
tha-ap298:1.2_0: what I was afflicted with food,
tha-ap298:1.4_0: yellow, with yellow hue, and yellow tint.
tha-ap298:2.1_0: That one of whom you ever mindful
tha-ap298:2.2_0: seeing the world and the world.
tha-ap298:3.2_0: as it gets close to the foot of a tree.
tha-ap298:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap298:3.4_0: The fruits of the feet are born.
tha-ap298:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap298:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhūmajaka.
tha-ap298:6.1_0: Sixths of the feet, a sixth part of the senior monks.
